translations: n.琥珀色，黄褐色；琥珀；<英>（交通信号）黄灯
adj.琥珀色的，黄褐色的；琥珀制的

phrs.translation: 黄灯；琥珀灯；琥珀色灯光

sentences.sentence: Cars did not stop when the lights were on amber.
sentences.translation: 当交通灯是黄色时汽车没有停下来。

sentences.sentence: A burst of sunshine sent a beam of amber light through the window.
sentences.translation: 一道阳光透过窗户射进了一束琥珀色的光。

sentences.sentence: The traffic lights were on amber.
